OptionPackage.DisplayName: SINAMICS Startdrive G130, G150, S120, S150, SINAMICS MV, S210
SINAMICS Startdrive G110M, G120, G120C, G120D, G120P

Comment.MultiLanguageText: Current Index when scrolling through errors
Delay between each scroll for a new error

AttributeList.Text: OR all of the possible errors. If any error Exists, SET bErrorExists

Set a static bit indicating that we are scrolling. Each pass cycle through the function, we will increment. If there is no error, set the scroll num to 0 and turn off scrolling. It scrolls to an error immediately when an error occurs.
Set bit to scroll for the next error
The function will only increment the scroll num one value per scan. It will scroll until it finds the next active error, then stop scrolling. Roll iNextScrollNum to 0 if it exceeds 30.
If we found an error, stop scrolling.
Check if the next scroll number has an error
Output the index of the error that exists.
Scrolls through the error codes for display on the HMI
